lines.text: My grandmother is totally convinced that the world is about to end.
She was going on about same thing during the Gulf War. Let's just hope she's wrong again.
What if she's not wrong? What if the world IS about to end?
What's it going to take to convince you that this is real?
You know what it's going to take, Helen? If Franco Macalusso shows up at that press conference tomorrow carrying a pitchfork.

As I speak these words, a deadly cloud is traveling across the Israeli country, killing every living thing it touches. Our gas masks are useless against its chemicals. This cloud does not care if you are a soldier or a civilian, an adult or a baby, a Jew or a Palestinian.
I can't wait, the Messiah says that we are all gods, that we have unspeakable powers within us all. Ohhh...whatever it takes, we've got to get rid of those haters.

[about Bronson]
He'll be allright, Helen, Jim and I have our whole church praying for him.
Thanks, Suzie, looks like we can use all the help we can get.
I'm not a religious man myself but God help us all.

[about Macalusso]
You worship him or you die, THAT is your choice.
